data.title: All about Vanessa Marcil | Heritage, relationship, career
data.meta_description: Vanessa Marcil is a well-known American actress. Her best-known television performances include Brenda Barrett on General Hospital, Gina Kincaid on
data.text:
Vanessa Marcil is a well-known American actress. Her best-known television performances include Brenda Barrett on General Hospital, Gina Kincaid on Beverly Hills, 90210, and Sam Marquez on Las Vegas. She was nominated and won three times for Best Supporting Actress.

Vanessa was born in Indio, California, United States of America in 1968. Her birthday is October 15 and she is 50 years old. She is an ethnically white American. Her astrological sign is Libra. Her academic credentials are still unknown to the media.

What is Vanessa Marcil’s net worth? Salary, Earnings

Vanessa appeared in several stage shows before landing the role of Brenda Barrett in the drama series. She began performing at the age of eight and sang original songs at her sixth grade talent competition.

Vanessa made her film debut in Prince’s music video ‘Poorgo’ on June 14, 1993, followed by ‘The Most Beautiful Girl in the World’ in 1994. Her film debut was in 1996, with ‘The Rock’.

Vanessa is most recognized for her appearances as Brenda Barrett, Gina Kincaid, and Sam Marquez on General Hospital, Beverly Hills 90210, and Las Vegas, respectively. She was nominated for three Daytime Emmy Awards for her work and was crowned Best Supporting Actress in 2003.

In February 1998, she was nominated for Best Leading Actress at the Soap Opera Digest Awards.

Vanessa has acted in several films.

She is a talented actress who brings a lot of love and care to her role. Stranded in Paradise, her most recent film was released in 2014, and she joined the cast of the pop reality series Queens of Drama in 2015. Vanessa recently appeared in the Hallmark Channel movie The Convenient Groom.

Vanessa is one of the most talented actresses in the film industry and has acquired significant wealth and fortune to date. In 2020, her net worth is expected to reach $4 million.

Is Vanessa Marcil married? Relationship

Vanessa was married to actor Corey Feldman from 1989 to 1993, but the marriage ended four years later. On July 11, 2010 she married actor Carmine Giovinazzo in a private ceremony. Vanessa was pregnant with her first child when she miscarried. She filed for divorce from Carmine in 2012 and the divorce was finalized in 2013.

Vanessa and her former Beverly Hills, 90210 co-star Brian Austin Green have a son, Kassius Lijah. Kassius was born on March 30, 2002.

Vanessa was born in the United States to Peter Ortiz and Patricia Marcil Ortiz. As a result, there is no information about her parents’ employment.

Vanessa Ortiz is the younger sister of Sherry, Sam and Tina Ortiz. There is no information about her siblings.

How tall is Vanessa Marcil? Weight, hair color

Vanessa is a beautiful woman with wonderful physical characteristics. She is 5 feet 4 inches tall and weighs approximately 56 kg. Vanessa’s smile has some dimples. Her eyes are dark brown and she has dark brown hair.
